# Reference versions {#sec-appendix-genome-versions}

## Downloading genome reference files

| Species | Version     | Command                                                                   |
|------------------------|------------------------|------------------------|
| human   | GRCh38/hg38 | `wget https://hgdownload.soe.ucsc.edu/goldenPath/hg38/bigZips/hg38.fa.gz` |
| human   | GRCh37/hg19 | `wget https://hgdownload.soe.ucsc.edu/goldenPath/hg19/bigZips/hg19.fa.gz` |
| mouse   | GRCm39/mm39 | `wget https://hgdownload.soe.ucsc.edu/goldenPath/mm39/bigZips/mm39.fa.gz` |
| mouse   | GRCm38/mm10 | `wget https://hgdownload.soe.ucsc.edu/goldenPath/mm10/bigZips/mm10.fa.gz` |
